{"id":554121373,"lang":"cpp","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1631523943,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"60 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/554121373/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"23.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool ispal(string s,int i,int j){\n        while(i<j)\n            if(s[i++]!=s[j--]) return false;\n        return true;\n    }\n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        int i=0,j=s.size()-1;\n        while(i<j){\n            if(s[i]!=s[j]) return ispal(s,i+1,j) || ispal(s,i,j-1);\n            i++;j--;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
